Changelog
=========

Versions follow `CalVer <http://calver.org>`_ with *no* backward-compatibility guarantees whatsoever.


18.2.0 (2018-01-12)
-------------------

Backward-incompatible changes:
^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

- Use ``RawConfigParser`` for ini-style secrets to avoid interpolation errors.


Changes:
^^^^^^^^

*none*
